title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.17 - Projects requiring approval by the commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.17 - Projects requiring approval by the commissioner

State Regulations
(a) No capital expenditures for which
approval by the Office of Mental Health is required under the provisions of the

Mental Hygiene Law or Part 551 of this Title shall be included in allowable
capital costs for purposes of computation of the rate of payment unless such
approval shall have been secured. (b) For projects requiring approval by the

Office of Mental Health, capital costs shall be limited to the amount approved
by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
578.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
